channel.title: Client not connecting to my server?
channel.description:
can any one please check if this client is connecting to my server correctly please?
I think it works for me on local host but not for other people to login but I have no way to check
if it does not connect could any one please see if they can find out what the problem is?
http://rapidshare.com/files/448644455/Nemoigescape_Client.rar
